items/other/misc/small_barn_black_bluepr: Use this item to place a small white barn construction site on your farm! Requirements to build: 100 wood, 75 stone.
items/other/misc/small_barn_red_blueprin: Use this item to place a small red barn construction site on your farm! Requirements to build: 100 wood, 75 stone.
items/other/misc/small_coop_black_bluepr: Use this item to place a small white coop construction site on your farm! Requirements to build: 75 wood, 50 stone.
items/other/misc/small_coop_red_blueprin: Use this item to place a small red coop construction site on your farm! Requirements to build: 75 wood, 50 stone.
